sentence.text: He then ended up on the floor twice at Fairyhouse and Punchestown before he ran against championship class when he filled fifth place behind General Idea in the Chase at Leopardstown over Christmas .

A bench made of timber some three inches in thickness filled the space under the window .

A thin disdainful blonde girl led me up narrow stairs to a room filled completely by a single bed .
